segments.text: The boy is stretching so far that his toes are barely on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching into the cookie jar, his fingers just barely grabbing the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is watching him, her eyes wide with excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the water pouring over the sink, spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting at her to turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she just stands there, lost in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling more and more, and the boy is about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so ridiculous that I can’t help but feel a little amused.
segments.speaker: PAR
